# Bug report

Please provide the following information. IMPORTANT: Do NOT include any personal data, protected health information (PHI), or any other sensitive information in this public issue. If your report concerns sensitive data exposure or a vulnerability that involves personal data, follow the secure reporting instructions below.

## What happened
- Steps to reproduce:
- Expected behavior:
- Actual behavior:
- Relevant logs / error messages (redact any personal data)

## Environment
- Version / commit:
- Platform / OS:
- Additional details:

## Privacy & sensitive-data warning
- Do NOT include any personal data, patient identifiers, PHI, or screenshots that show sensitive information in GitHub issues.
- If your report includes or concerns sensitive data (for example, accidental exposure of health data), report it securely instead of posting it publicly (see Secure reporting below).

## Secure reporting (use this when your report involves PHI or other sensitive data)
- Preferred secure reporting channel: https://github.com/awesome-selfhosted/awesome-selfhosted-data/issues

## Optional: How we can reproduce it safely
- If you can reproduce without real patient data, please provide a sanitized reproduction (redacted data or synthetic data).
